name: Add new TSheets timesheets to Google Sheets
description:
Every time a new Timesheet is posted to a specified TSheets account, Make will automatically add that timesheet to Google Sheets. 
The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GTHFXIZTYjC7hdnbwsQFL83dq2AJzwxLRm26pF24hY0/edit?usp=sharing).
